comment: Version of ~ dral1 with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . Remark: the corresponding versions for ~ dral2 and ~ drex2 are instances of ~ albidv and ~ exbidv respectively. (Contributed by BJ, 17-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
